channel.title: Steinitz Chess Club
channel.description: Recent content on Steinitz Chess Club

item.title: Evaluate before you Calculate!
item.description:
Positional Insight: The Four Key Elements

Positional insight is gained by applying four key elements to any position. These universal elements will improve your calculation process once fully grasped. Don’t rush to calculate lines—first aim to understand the situation.

item.title: Kenny Willenberg
item.description: I am very active as a Semi-Pro Chess Player on the Elite South African Chess Scene and a High Performance Private Chess Trainer with over 20 years experience coaching at all levels. On a National Level I am proud to still hold the record for most consecutive SA Junior Titles winning the National Junior Championship (SAJCC) in U16 - U20 an unprecedented 5 years in a row including being 2 Time Winner of SA Junior Closed (SAJCCC) The most prestigious Junior Chess event in South Africa.

item.title: Privacy
item.description:
Privacy Policy

At Steinitz Chess Club, we’re not just about chess — we’re about people. That means we respect your privacy and take care to protect any personal information you share with us. This policy explains, in plain language, what we collect, why we collect it, and how you stay in control.
